alert.note: Alert for Brown; Jackson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 6:19PM CDT until May 30 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Brown County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Horton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hiawatha, Horton, Everest, Robinson, Whiting and Willis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas.
